title: Quality Assurance Engineer, Security Engineering & Architecture
summary: The Security Engineering and Architecture QA team is seeking a QA engineer with the ability to work in a fast paced environment, strong experience with developing tests and technical acumen. In this role you will work with other QA and Software Engineers, on and outside the team, to test various security projects.
description: The work will involve designing and implementing test plans for Security features. You will need to show abilities in communicating with both developers, Engineering Program Managers, other QA Engineers to build solid test plans, execute & report results. This role requires strong analytical skills, excellent problem-solving and interpersonal skills, and a passion to make the best products possible. Some of the key responsibilities in this role will include: Communicate frequently with managers and engineers across the organization. Create and get consensus on project plans and project concepts. Develop detailed and methodical tests. Work with engineering teams to deeply understand their technology and develop test plans around it. Debug and report issues encountered during testing. Help triage the team's daily automation results.
